name: King Dedede's Tater Chip Castle
description:
IF YOU WANNA HELP ME

HAND ME ANOTHER BAG OF DEM CHIPS

King Dedede had turned his castle into a Potato Chip museum.. for some reason. And you are hungry AF and decided to eat some BBQ Chips, Dedede is mad at you and wants them chips back. Eat all 10 Bags of chips and get out.

Dedede is the only character you see in game in person.

The rest of the characters are seen on pictures.
